column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I took my parents here and we ordered 9 different tapas
column2: and each and every one of them were almost as good as the last (especially the shrimp and crab gratin). Â The inside of the restaurant is really nice looking
column3: and there is a pretty nice outdoor seating area
column4: although it was a bit too humid to sit out there last night.
